title:
Association schemes obtained from the action of the general unitary
  group on isotropic vectors
authors: Nathaniel Benjamin and Sung Yell Song
abstract:
An infinite family of association schemes obtained from the general unitary
groups acting transitively on the sets of isotropic vectors in the finite
unitary spaces are investigated. We compute the parameters and determine the
character tables for all nontrivial commutative association schemes belonging
to this family.
